Title: Säkkijärvi Polka
Actors: Sakari Jurkka, Marjatta Kallio, Ekke Hämäläinen
Plot: A biopic of Vili Vesterinen, a popular Finnish accordion virtuoso (1907-61). After years of playing by the ear and for free at local country dances in his home province Karelia, he is accepted at the Viipuri Conservatory to study ...
